glsa.title: Perl Safe module: Arbitrary Perl code injection
glsa.synopsis: The Safe module for Perl does not properly restrict code, allowing a remote attacker to execute arbitrary Perl code outside of a restricted compartment.

background.p: Safe is a Perl module to compile and execute code in restricted compartments.

description.p: Unsafe code evaluation prevents the Safe module from properly restricting the code of implicitly called methods on implicitly blessed objects.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to load a specially crafted Perl script, resulting in execution arbitrary Perl code outside of a restricted compartment.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
